mapper.insert: insert into support (idx, id, email, addr, hp, present_name, present_option, price, support_date, end_date) values (#{idx}, #{id}, #{email}, #{addr}, #{hp}, #{present_name}, #{present_option}, #{price}, now(), #{end_date})
mapper.update: update project set number_support=number_support+1 where idx=#{idx}
update project set total_amount=total_amount+#{pstP} where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select email from user where id=#{id};
select hp from user where id=#{id};
select addr,addr2 from delivery where id=#{id} and pin=1
